TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed AcknowledgeTypes extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定消息队列返回到发送应用程序的确认消息类型。

span.span: Specifies the types of acknowledgment message that Message Queuing returns to the sending application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了一组标志，你可以组合使用来请求一个或多个类别的确认消息。The class provides a set of flags that you can combine to request one or more categories of acknowledgment messages. 当应用程序发送一条消息时，它可以请求，消息队列返回指示成功或失败的原始消息的确认消息。When an application sends a message, it can request that Message Queuing return acknowledgment messages indicating the success or failure of the original message. 消息队列将这些确认消息发送到你指定的管理队列。Message Queuing sends these acknowledgment messages to the administration queue you specify. 确认类型可广泛划分为四个组： 正到达确认、 肯定读取的确认、 否定到达确认和否定读取的确认。Acknowledgment types can be divided broadly into four groups: positive arrival acknowledgments, positive read acknowledgments, negative arrival acknowledgments, and negative read acknowledgments. 请求确认使你的应用程序可以接收特定事件的通知-例如，消息到达其目标队列、 正在检索消息或阻止一条消息到达或从正在检索的超时目标队列。Requesting acknowledgments enables your application to receive notification of certain occurrences—for example, a message reaching its destination queue, a message being retrieved, or a time-out preventing a message from reaching or being retrieved from the destination queue. 如果要使用类将消息发送到队列中，指定类型的确认你的应用程序应接收在属性，以及接收的确认消息中的管理队列属性。When you are using the class to send messages to a queue, you specify the types of acknowledgments your application should receive in the property, as well as the administration queue that receives the acknowledgment messages in the property. 当你使用类来读取确认消息中的管理队列，该实例的属性指示的条件负责的确认消息，例如，如果超时过期之前已从队列中读取原始消息。When you use the class to read acknowledgment messages in the administration queue, the instance's property indicates the condition responsible for the acknowledgment message, for example, if a time-out expired before the original message was read from the queue. ## Examples 下面的代码示例发送和接收包含订单与队列的消息。The following code example sends and receives a message that contains an order to and from a queue. 它特别请求肯定确认当原始消息到达或已从队列中检索。It specifically requests a positive acknowledgment when the original message reaches or is retrieved from the queue. [!code-cpp[Message.Acknowledgment#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.Acknowledgment/CPP/message_acknowledgment.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Message.Acknowledgment#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.Acknowledgment/CS/message_acknowledgment.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Message.Acknowledgment#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.Acknowledgment/VB/message_acknowledgment.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.AcknowledgeTypes FullReachQueue = int32(5)

summary.span: 一个掩码，用于在原始消息到达队列时请求肯定确认，或者用于到达队列时间计时器过期后请求否定确认，或者用于不能对原始消息进行身份验证时请求否定确认。

span.span: A mask used to request positive acknowledgment if the original message reaches the queue or negative acknowledgment if the time-to-reach-queue timer expires or if the original message cannot be authenticated.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.AcknowledgeTypes FullReceive = int32(14)

summary.span: 一个掩码，用于在接收时间计时器过期前从队列收到原始消息时请求肯定确认，否则请求否定确认。

span.span: A mask used to request positive acknowledgment if the original message is received from the queue before its time-to-be-received timer expires or negative acknowledgment otherwise.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.AcknowledgeTypes NegativeReceive = int32(8)

summary.span: 一个掩码，用于当未能从队列接收原始消息时请求否定确认。

span.span: A mask used to request a negative acknowledgment when the original message fails to be received from the queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用因此无法返回此确认类型，即使未扫视消息方法不会从队列中删除一条消息。Using the method does not remove a message from the queue, so this acknowledgment type could be returned even if you did peek the message. 仅方法 (或相关异步方法) 中从队列中移除消息。Only the method (or the related asynchronous method) removes a message from the queue.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.AcknowledgeTypes None = int32(0)

summary.span: 一个掩码，用于请求不发送任何确认消息（无论是肯定的还是否定的）。

span.span: A mask used to request that no acknowledgment messages (positive or negative) be posted.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.AcknowledgeTypes NotAcknowledgeReachQueue = int32(4)

summary.span: 一个掩码，用于在原始消息不能到达队列时请求否定确认。

span.span: A mask used to request a negative acknowledgment when the original message cannot reach the queue.

summary.span: 当到达队列时间计时器过期时或不能对消息进行身份验证时，可能请求否定确认。

span.span: This can happen when the time-to-reach-queue timer expires or if a message cannot be authenticated.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.AcknowledgeTypes NotAcknowledgeReceive = int32(12)

summary.span: 一个掩码，用于当发生错误时请求否定确认，防止在其接收时间计时器过期前从队列接收原始消息。

span.span: A mask used to request a negative acknowledgment when an error occurs that prevents the original message from being received from the queue before its time-to-be-received timer expires.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.AcknowledgeTypes PositiveArrival = int32(1)

summary.span: 一个掩码，用于在原始消息到达队列时请求肯定确认。

span.span: A mask used to request a positive acknowledgment when the original message reaches the queue.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.AcknowledgeTypes PositiveReceive = int32(2)

summary.span: 一个掩码，用于在成功从队列检索到原始消息时请求肯定确认。

span.span: A mask used to request a positive acknowledgment when the original message is successfully retrieved from the queue.
